name: Heavy Estarayo
customPrimary: Explodes on contact or after reaching maximum range, dealing 150 High Explosive damage in an area. Explosion size and damage dealt reduced under under 1000 range, with explosion not taking place if distance to target is 300 or smaller.

name: Estarayo
customPrimary: Explodes on contact or after reaching maximum range, dealing 90 High Explosive damage in an area. Explosion size and damage dealt reduced under under 900 range, with explosion not taking place if distance to target is 200 or smaller.

name: Light Estarayo
customPrimary: Explodes on contact or after reaching maximum range, dealing 30 High Explosive damage in an area. Explosion size and damage dealt reduced under under 700 range, with explosion not taking place if distance to target is 50 or smaller.
